<!-- source-hash: f412d5774847160af64f35fbcffd5278 -->
A data transfer object representing a tag entity with metadata, designed for API responses in the OpenFrame device management system.

## Key Components

- **TagResponse**: Main DTO class with comprehensive tag information
- **Swagger Annotations**: Complete OpenAPI documentation with examples
- **Lombok Annotations**: Auto-generated boilerplate code (getters, setters, constructors)
- **Builder Pattern**: Fluent object construction via `@Builder`

### Fields

- `id` - Unique tag identifier
- `name` - Human-readable tag name  
- `description` - Optional tag description
- `color` - Hex color code for UI display
- `organizationId` - Associated organization
- `createdAt` - Creation timestamp
- `createdBy` - Creator user ID

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating a tag response
TagResponse tag = TagResponse.builder()
    .id("tag-123")
    .name("production")
    .description("Production environment servers")
    .color("#FF5733")
    .organizationId("org-456")
    .createdAt(Instant.now())
    .createdBy("user-789")
    .build();

// Using in REST controller
@GetMapping("/tags/{id}")
public ResponseEntity<TagResponse> getTag(@PathVariable String id) {
    TagResponse tag = tagService.findById(id);
    return ResponseEntity.ok(tag);
}
```

The class serves as a contract for tag data exchange between the API layer and clients, with built-in validation and documentation through Swagger annotations.
